dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 131 IH: Manatee Protection Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Buchanan introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To designate the West Indian manatee as an endangered species under the Endangered Species Act of 1973, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Manatee Protection Act of 2023.

section.header: West Indian manatee designated endangered species

subsection.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, the species known as the West Indian manatee (Trichechus manatus) shall be treated as an endangered species for purposes of the Endangered Species Act of 1973 (16 U.S.C. 1531 et seq.).

Notwithstanding any other provision of law, the Secretary of the Interior shall include the species known as the West Indian manatee (Trichechus manatus) in the endangered species list published under section 4(c) of the Endangered Species Act of 1973 (16 U.S.C. 1533(c)).
